pages.text: Raccoon are neutral gray small mammals. They are known thief that often steals food out chests and barrel.$(br2)Raccons can be tamed if given a Chicken's Egg near water where them were able to wash the egg. Tamed Raccoons can be made to sit, follow, wander.$(br)They can be given carpets and will gain bandanas dependind of the color of carpet used.
They will plifer items from villagers and wandersing traders. Those items will appear in the Raccoon's mouth.
